name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.45 - The Block Breaker 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

The ultimate evolution is here...
In addition to "Squash", "Tray-swaying", "Item" and "Multi-mode" in previous title, strategic aspect such as performance and stage strategies are also enhanced.
Heated multi-play battle and COM battle are available, and also a VS Mode in which victory or defeat is determined within a short period of time.
New tactics and strategies are necessary

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PS3™ or PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
